name: Thirsty Crow
description:
Made for MISJam 2018
Theme: Where there is a will, there is a way

Controls:
A/D - Movement
W/Space - Jump

There once was a thirsty crow who wanted to fly over the world.
He could not go far without stopping to drink water.
After flying, he would feel weak, and start to lose hope.
One day, he saw a waterhole and went to it. There was water there, but too deep for his beak to reach.
After thinking for a while, he saw some pebbles and had an idea.
He would collect and drop them into the hole to raise the water level. 
He would then fly and continue his journey.
